name: Di-Lithium Lift
overview: You battled with them across the galaxy in 3D Space Wars. They invaded the Earth and you fought them again in 3D Seiddab Attack. Now the SEIDDAB are back again. This time they have stolen your vital Dilithium Crystals and placed them in a vault guarded by Droids armed with lasers. You break into the vault and scramble to collect the Crystals as the seconds tick away ...
